court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT
outcome: When the matter has been taken up for hearing, the learned counsel for the petitioner has requested for granting permission to withdraw this Crl.M.C. Accordingly, this Crl.M.C. stands dismissed
full_text: Bisa torn 1 4 are 2017/KER/49556 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR THURSDAY, THE 7TH DAY OF DECEMBER 2017/16TH AGRAHAYANA, 1939 Crl.MC.No. 7001 of 2017 () C.M.P.NO.1254/2016 (A) IN C.C.NO.23 OF 2008 OF ENQUIRY COMMISSIONER AND SPECIAL JUDGE, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM. CRIME NO. 11/1996 OF V.A.C.B., KOLLAM PETITIONER (S) /ACCUSED: BIRTHELOMEO BIRTY, AGED 66,S/0.MARYAN.F.MORRIS,FABI, PATTATHANAM EAST ,KOLLAM-691021. BY ADV. SRI.SIVAN MADATHIL RESPONDENT (S) /DE-FACTO COMPLAINANT & STATE: STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM , KOCHI-682031. BY SPECIAL GOVERNMENT PLEADER (VACB) SRI.RAJESH A. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 07-12-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: STK ES 2017/KER/49556 B. SUDHEENDRA KUMAR, J. Crl.M.C. No.7001 of 2017 Dated this the 7 day of December, 2017 ORDER When the matter has been taken up for hearing, the learned counsel for the petitioner has requested for granting permission to withdraw this Crl.M.C. Accordingly, this Crl.M.C. stands dismissed as withdrawn. 2. However, the learned counsel for the petitioner has submitted that there was a direction in Annexure-A6 order that the personal presence of the petitioner is to be dispensed with by the court concerned and the petitioner need not be compelled to appear now. 3. The petitioner is aged 66 years. The learned Special Public Prosecutor has submitted that further investigation will be complete and the supplementary report will be filed before the court within 30 days from today. Since the supplementary final report is not yet filed after completing the further investigation, it is a S ware ra 2017/KER/49556 Cri.M.C. No.7001 of 2017 -32%- directed that the petitioner need not appear before the court below in C.C.No.9/2009 till the filing of supplementary final report by the respondent. I! also direct the court below to give notice to the learned counsel appearing for the petitioner before that court, intimating the date on which the petitioner has to appear before that court, after the filing of the supplementary final report by the respondent, as the appearance of the petitioner shall be subject to the result of the further investigation. Sd/- B. SUDHEENDRA KUMAR, JUDGE STK /[TRUE COPY// //P.A. TO JUDGE//
